arts.ttl: Neymar back after a year out and helps Al-Hilal in Asian Champions League
arts.sum: Neymar returned to action after a year out through injury and helped Al-Hilal beat Al Ain of the United Arab Emirates 5-4 in the group stage of the AFC Champions League Elite on Monday. He came off the bench 369 days later for the four-time Asian champion with 13 minutes remaining at Al Ain. He almost scored immediately when his low shot from left of the area shaved the post.

arts.ttl: Neymar returns one year after ACL injury
arts.sum: Brazil forward Neymar makes his first appearance for Al-Hilal in over a year after recovering from surgery on a ruptured anterior cruciate ligament and meniscus in his left knee.

arts.ttl: Leao sends Neymar message as Brazil star makes return after 12 months out
arts.sum: Milan star Rafael Leao is among the football superstars to send a message of congratulations...

arts.ttl: Neymar makes return after year out with ACL tear
arts.sum: Neymar has made his first appearance in over a year after suffering an anterior cruciate ligament tear, coming off the bench in Al Hilal's AFC Champions League Elite clash against Al Ain.

arts.ttl: Chelsea signing Estêvão breaks Neymar U17 record for goals and assists
arts.sum: Chelsea will inherit a potential superstar when Estêvão finally moves to Stamford Bridge next summer from Palmeiras. Several European clubs attempted to sign the Brazilian...

arts.ttl: Chelsea-bound 'Messinho' breaks Neymar goalscoring record in Palmeiras victory
arts.sum: Soon-to-be Chelsea attacker Estevao Willian breaks a Brazilian goalscoring record set by Neymar in Palmeiras' recent win over Juventude.

arts.ttl: Estevao breaks Neymar goal record ahead of Chelsea visit
arts.sum: Not only are Estevao's numbers sensational for a player of his age, but they are among the best managed in Brazil's top flight this season. Palmeiras winger Estevao broke Neymar's record for goal contributions for an Under-17 player in Brazil's top flight with his dazzing display against Juventude.

arts.ttl: Chelsea-bound wonderkid Estevao Willian - nicknamed 'Messinho' - breaks Neymar record after scoring again for Palmeiras
arts.sum: Estevao registered a goal and an assist in Parlimias' 5-3 win over Juventude on Sunday night to take his goal contributions for the Brazilian side to 18 in 2024.

arts.ttl: It's official! Chelsea have signed the next Neymar
arts.sum: Chelsea -bound wonderkid Estevao Willian has officially broken Neymar ’s record for the most goal involvements from an U17 player in a single season of the Brazilian top flight. The 17-year-old has the most goal involvements of any player in the top flight of Brazilian football, despite his tender age, and comparisons with Neymar have ramped up following his latest record.

arts.ttl: OFFICIAL: Neymar’s Saudi Arabia ordeal is over
arts.sum: This is not the first time that Neymar has had to overcome a serious injury problem. Neymar has endured a nightmare period since moving to Saudi Pro League side Al-Hilal, yet all of that is set to be put behind the Brazil international star.
